darkMode.label: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: enable dark theme appearance for better readability in low light

colorScheme.label: Color Scheme
colorScheme.description: choose the color theme for the interface

customCSS.label: Custom CSS
customCSS.description: add your own css styles to customize the appearance

fileView.label: File View
fileView.description: choose how files are displayed - detailed shows metadata, compact saves space, reader optimizes for reading

fontFamily.label: Font Family
fontFamily.description: select the font style for text display

sidebarMetadata.label: Show Metadata
sidebarMetadata.description: display file metadata information in the sidebar

sidebarPara.label: Show PARA Organization
sidebarPara.description: show para method organization structure in the sidebar

sidebarConnections.label: Show Connections

sidebarToc.label: Show Table of Contents
sidebarToc.description: show document outline and table of contents

sidebarVersionHistory.label: Show Version History
sidebarVersionHistory.description: display file version history and changes

linkDisplayMode.label: Link Display Mode
